p: As explained by Trifunschi et al (2015), the hepatoprotective activities of the plant extracts could be due to their free radical scavenging activity. 47 Additionally, their anti-inflammatory activity could contribute to their hepatoprotective activity, as paracetamol toxicity produces inflammatory mediators such as monocytes, neutrophils and cytokines (interleukin-6 and tissue necrosis factor Î±). 48
